Articles.Content: hi guys. ok, this is the problem: i'm making a mod on a semirealistic fusion engine, so high isp and low thrust. as all of you know, that would be a real PITA to use. is there any mod that would accelerate the thrusting time? or a good soul that would make one? i dont have the knowledge to code it myself
Check out HoneyFox's Orbit Manipulator mod.
i've already tried it, but the nose of the ship, if i start the time warp, slowly shift upward. sadly is unusable

Well, that shift is due to the ship being rotationally locked while in warp. There may be a way to apply a rotation while in warp, or alternatively you could try the hyper-warp part of MY MOD combined with an autopilot of your choice.
i've tried, sadly it has too much lag
cybutek has a mod for persistent rotation, as does skykooler.
